name: Bruno F. Ribeiro
content: Bruno Ribeiro - Purdue University Bruno Ribeiro Associate Professor of Computer Science Purdue University Hall of Data Science and AI 3142 Department of Computer Science Purdue University West Lafayette, IN ribeirob@purdue.edu Curriculum Vitae [PDF] Recent News (Spring 2025): The CS58700 Foundations of Deep Learning course has reached maximum capacity. However, we anticipate that some seats may become available after the initial week of classes since the class is at 9:30am.If you are interested in enrolling, we recommend waiting until after the first week of classes Upcoming talk at the Joint Mathematics Meeting on the Mathematics of Graph Foundation Models: Jan 8th, 2025, 1-2pm."As we exhaust sequential data for training LLMs, relational data remains mostly untapped. In this talk we will explore the mathematical challenges and potential solutions for harnessing relational data in foundation models." Congratulations to Beatrice Bevilacqua for her 2024 MIT EECS Risiting Stars award. I am back from my sabbatical at Stanford. Current Students PhD Beatrice Bevilacqua Jincheng Zhou Yucheng Zhang MSc Ipsit Mantri Undergraduate Former Students PhD S Chandra Mouli (Ph.D. 2024, Applied Scientist @ Meta) Yangze Zhou (Ph.D. 2024,
